details:
adjective
- involving the entire earth
= synonyms: worldwide
- having no fixed course
= synonyms: erratic
- of or relating to or resembling the physical or orbital characteristics of a planet or the planets
= example: of or relating to or resembling the physical or orbital characteristics of a planet or the planets
= synonyms: planetal
- of or relating to or characteristic of the planet Earth or its inhabitants
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of the planet Earth or its inhabitants
= synonyms: terrestrial
